reference.shortdesc: The vrmlist element contains a set of vrm elements for logging the version, release, and modification information for multiple products or versions of products to which the topic applies.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: .

example.title: Example
example.p: The recent versions of a hypothetical product might be logged by using the vrmlist markup:
example.codeblock: <prolog> <metadata> <prodinfo> <prodname>Widge-o-matic</prodname> <vrmlist> <vrm version="1" release="2" modification="0"/> <vrm version="1" release="2" modification="1"/> </vrmlist> </prodinfo> </metadata> </prolog>
example.p: This indicates that the topic covers Version 1, release 2, modification levels 0 and 1 (often expressed as version 1.2.0 and 1.2.1).
